# TickingAreaError Class

> [!CAUTION]
> This class is still in pre-release.  Its signature may change or it may be removed in future releases.

## Extends
- *Error*

The error returned from invalid [*@minecraft/server.TickingAreaManager*](../../../scriptapi/minecraft/server/TickingAreaManager.md) method calls.

## Properties

### **reason**
`read-only reason: TickingAreaErrorReason;`

The specific reason that the error was thrown.

Type: [*TickingAreaErrorReason*](TickingAreaErrorReason.md)

Notes:
